dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Corinna Cortes
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of 70,000 images of handwritten digits (28x28 black and white pixels) with equal amounts of samples for each digit class, used for evaluating the performance of machine learning models.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Jack W Smith
J E Everhart
W C Dickson
W C Knowler
R S Johannes
dcterms:description: The Pima Indians Diabetes dataset contains 8 features describing the relevant characteristics of patients useful for predicting diabetes, with a binary target label indicating the presence or absence of diabetes.
dcterms:title: Pima Indians Diabetes Dataset

dcterms:creator: ProPublica
dcterms:description: The COMPAS Recidivism dataset consists of 7,214 arrests logged in Broward County, Florida, containing features that describe the demographics and criminal history of defendants, used for predicting recidivism.
dcterms:title: COMPAS Recidivism Dataset
